titleStmt.title: The possibility, expediency, and necessity of divine revelation a sermon preached at St. Martins in the Fields, Jan. 7. 1694/5 : at the beginning of the lecture for the ensuing year, founded by the honourable Robert Boyle, Esquire / by John Williams ...
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ric. Chiswell ... and Tho. Cockerill ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Half title: Dr. Williams's first sermon at Mr. Boyle's lecture, 1695.
